price: 9. Mise waxay hayaan khasnadaha Naxariista Rabbigaa, Adkaadaha Sare, Deeqsiga ah aad wax u bixiya?
arabic: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَحۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡوَهَّابِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: am ʿindahum khazāinu raḥmati rabbika al-ʿazīzi al-wahābi
